tool_description:
API for odds result based on API-FOOTBALL
https://rapidapi.com/api-sports/api/api-football/
title: Bets-Results

api_list.name: Status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bets-results.p.rapidapi.com/status/{fixture}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bets-results.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Results
api_list.description: Get results based on odd and fixture
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bets-results.p.rapidapi.com/result"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bets-results.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bets-results.p.rapidapi.com/result"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bets-results.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
